iy7_sIwLzx-2QC8rF6MJoA.text: This cafe Nero is a little tired and could do with a spruce up. We were sat nearish the disabled toilet and whenever the door was opened it really smelled bad.   The staff were nice and the coffee is good which is why it got 3 stars rather than one.  I think the location saves this place rather than the quality of the decor.

photos.caption: Photo of Caffe Nero - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. White chocolate mocha

Lkmc6-PB1_IyZIjpZP1o6g.text: They're very strict here about where you can and cannot sit. You cannot, for example, move chairs around near the front door. You can, on the other hand, sit under the phenomenally powerful and cold air conditioning unit at the back. I usually go for a takeaway - they do make great coffee and the snacks (although expensive) are good. The sandwiches are also usually very good.
